name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-knockout-taxonomy
title: Taxonomy Web Part
shortDescription: Sample Web Part illustrating Reading taxonomy term stores' hierarchy from SharePoint, Loading JavaScript Object Model scripts, creating Knockout components
longDescription: Sample Web Part illustrating Reading taxonomy term stores' hierarchy from SharePoint, Loading JavaScript Object Model scripts, creating Knockout components

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
